attributes.name: forceTolerance
attributes.description: An equilibrium will be accepted if all the force components are lower than the force tolerance, and all the moment components are lower than the moment tolerance.

attributes.name: momentTolerance
attributes.description: An equilibrium will be accepted if all the force components are lower than the force tolerance, and all the moment components are lower than the moment tolerance.

attributes.name: body
attributes.description: Body for which GZ-curve will be calculated

attributes.name: minAzimuthAngle
attributes.description: Minimum angle of the azimuth axis of rotation (body-related coordinate system)

attributes.name: maxAzimuthAngle
attributes.description: Maximum angle of the azimuth axis of rotation (body-related coordinate system)

attributes.name: minRotationAngle
attributes.description: Minimum inclination angle about the azimuth axis

attributes.name: maxRotationAngle
attributes.description: Maximum inclination angle about the azimuth axis
